text:
the hyperlink to webgain is no longer valid - should be:
https://javacc.dev.java.net
creator: neil.pitman@sympatico.ca
bodewig@apache.org
text:
INVALID or FIXED - depends on how you look at it.

Ant 1.5.4 will not work with the java.net version of JavaCC.  The webgain version
is the only one that works.

Ant's CVS HEAD and the upcoming Ant 1.6 can deal with Webgain's as well as the
java.net and the intermediate experimenatlstuff (JavCC 3.0) versions and points
to dev.java.net in its manual.
